name: Forgotten (itch) (Dingo)
description:
Forgotten is a short 5 minute game project made long time ago for my High School degree in animations as it was one of the few actual game projects I've managed to make. 

I hope you enjoy this short experience about a Samurai trying to finish his deed and not be... Forgotten.

IMPORTANT: 
To run this game you require to installing the official RPG MAKER XP RTR (Runtime package) 
You can get it here: https://www.rpgmakerweb.com/run-time-package

OR If you already OWN RPG MAKER XP you can run it without a issue.

Controls:
- Arrow Keys to move
- X, Y, Enter and Space bar to interact and progress dialog
- Esc to open menu or go back
- Alt + Enter for Fullscreen and out

Hope you enjoy <3
